objectives.primary_objective: Learn and understand - What is Pollution?
learning_outcomes: Recall basic ideas about what is pollution?
Develop awareness about energy and environment

word_list.definition: The ability to do work or make things move.
word_list.example_usage: The Sun gives us energy as heat and light.

word_list.definition: Making the environment dirty and harmful.
word_list.example_usage: Throwing waste in water causes pollution.
